ssa-survivor-benefits-child.title: Survivors Benefits for Child
ssa-survivor-benefits-child.headline: Survivors Benefits for Child
ssa-survivor-benefits-child.source.name: Social Security Administration
ssa-survivor-benefits-child.summary: Social Security survivors benefits are paid to a child, stepchild, grandchild, or adopted child of eligible workers.
You are under 18 years old (under 19 years old if you are a full-time student in an elementary or secondary school).
